## API name

Name of the API (must exist in `data/catalog.json` or be a new addition).

## Preview type

Which preview component fits best?

- [ ] `weather` - Temperature + forecast bars
- [ ] `chart` - SVG line/bar chart
- [ ] `map` - Geo pin visualization
- [ ] `list` - Scrollable rows
- [ ] `media` - Image display
- [ ] `code` - Syntax-highlighted JSON
- [ ] `card` - Key-value pairs

Paste example response data from the API (or a link to their docs):

Show what the preview looks like.
